physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Visible goiter and exophthalmia, small anterior fontanel without craniosynostosis
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Goiter continued to grow, requiring thyroidectomy at the age of 10.5 years

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum FT4 (FT4 > 100 pmol/liter), Serum FT3 (FT3 > 35 pmol/liter), Serum TSH (< 0.05 mU/liter)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Undetectable TSH levels during hyperthyroid state
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After treatment, serum TSH concentrations increased and reached the normal range after surgical intervention

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Levels of thyroid hormones within normal range post-treatment
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Following radioiodine therapy, TSH levels normalizing; from low (hypothyroid) back to normal range
